section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: I have disposition of two cases to announce.
In 75-44 Burrell against McRay, the Writ of Certiorari can be United States Court of Appeals for the Fourth Circuit is dismissed as having been improvidently granted.
Mr. Justice White would affirm the judgment of Court of Appeals.
Mr. Justice Stevens filed a concurring opinion.
Mr. Justice Brennan joined by and Mr. Justice Marshall filed a dissenting opinion.
